archimate:Goal.name: Achieve Technical Interoperability
archimate:Goal.documentation:
Definition: Achieving Technical Interoperability involves establishing standards and protocols that enable different systems and technologies to communicate and work together seamlessly
Interoperability Dimension: Behavioral IoP
Viewpoint: Key Interoperability Enablers viewpoint
Identifier: http://data.europa.eu/dr8/AchieveTechnicalInteroperabilityGoal
ABB name: eira:AchieveTechnicalInteroperabilityGoal

Last modification: 2024-01-28
Identifier: http://data.europa.eu/dr8/AchieveTechnicalInteroperabilityGoal
Interoperability Layer: N/A

properties.value: Achieving Technical Interoperability involves establishing standards and protocols that enable different systems and technologies to communicate and work together seamlessly
